pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample Size and Power Calculations using the APPLE, SEPPLE, APPLE+ and SEPPLE+ Methods // Provides sample size and power calculations when the treatment time-lag effect is present and the lag duration is either homogeneous across the individual subject, or varies heterogeneously from individual to individual within a certain domain and following a specific pattern. The methods used are described in Xu, Z., Zhen, B., Park, Y., Zhu, B. (2017) doi:10.1002/sim.7157.
